name: Clock
description: Clock for Local, Tyria, and Server time

changelog.1.1.1: 2021-10-14: Added check for loading screen or map open, Upgraded to Blish 0.11.0, fixed 24Hr time to show leading zero.
changelog.1.1.0: 2021-09-20: Custom Settings Panel, Drag Panel instead of coords, Upgraded to Blish 0.10.0
